Because our contract system is in its infancy, why not give contracts more variety with these suggestions.

-I realise I might take flak for this, but why not give the option to launch missions for different companies like GPS satellites, probes, or even space stations for Ã¢Ë†Å¡. For those who don't want a bunch of random space-craft around the system, just delete them when they are completed or don't accept them.

-Also, Missions to DESTROY debris that is caught in orbit by either slamming into it or just burning against it, or even repair defunct satellites by sending a kerbal out on EVA and interacting with it.

-Or potentially, when you have space station(Flagged by renaming your vessel as such), you can send "scientists" up to dock with it, and eventually return them(safely).

I realize i have not fleshed these out a lot. but they are ideas that could be expanded upon.

Edited August 5, 2014 by Cavenyanson

If you do not intend to play entirely stock, try FinePrint; this mod gives you all kinds of contracts dealing with asteroids, ground bases and space stations. Link

Mods aside, I agree that KSP could use more kinds of contracts, but I also think that they will be added sooner or later. I really like your ideas though.
